Detailed Description

ball track visualization as green circles just for visualization of real time tracking

00206 
00207                 int depthIndex = (int)((640 - _xMomentsTemp) + (640 * _yMomentsTemp));
00208                 depth = m_depthinm[depthIndex] * 0.001;
00209 
00210                 if(depth != 0)
00211                 {
00212                    if((_xMomentsTemp >= _boundsCheck.x) && (_xMomentsTemp <= _boundsCheck.x + _boundsCheck.width)
00213                            && (_yMomentsTemp >= _boundsCheck.y) && (_yMomentsTemp <= _boundsCheck.y + _boundsCheck.height))
00214                    {
00215                        cv::ellipse(drawing,r,cv::Scalar(0,255,0),-1,8);
00216                        std::cout<<"Rect center x:"<<r.center.x<<"\n";
00217                    }
00218                  }
00219 
00220              }
00221 
00222           }
00223 
00224        _frameCount++;
00225

00227 
00228      }

00230      {
00231         // tracking not yet started...do nothing
00232      }
